title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: Mechatronics-Based Robotic Control System Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement mobile robot control algorithms on 2D planes using computer vision-based location tracking systems.
Learners can develop a robot movement path simulation tool based on the mechatronics core concept of "line segments."
Learners can explain system optimization methods using real-time feedback systems in collaborative problem-solving processes via LMS platforms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
